comment: Professor Madore is extremely kind and genuinely cares about his students' success. His lectures helped me a lot when writing my annotated bib. and final research paper. He is a thorough grader, but provides clear feedback and provides extra credit opportunities. He is very caring and understanding as well.

I really enjoyed his class. He was a tough grader but he would always give great feedback on how to improve and do better for the next assignment. Was always giving us extra credit opportunities and truly cared for us to do better in his class. Was very lenient understanding we also have a life outside of school and I truly enjoyed taking his cours

Professor Madore is awesome. I loved going to his class and he cares about his student's success. All the free writes and hybrid worked helped going into the final paper. I would definitely recommend taking him if you can!!

Amazing class! I loved the freewriting in every lesson and each lesson was leading up to help in our final paper. He likes it when there are class discussions or discussions on our writing/free writing. Powerpoints were straightforward to understand. He is also super approachable and caring!
rating_tags: Amazing lectures --Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class

comment: best teacher I had last semester, he was very nice and understanding. his lectures were short and to the point--also not mandatory but they were genuinely helpful in preparing for each essay. there were 3 essays the whole semester and 2 simple discussion posts a week. he's always willing to help and grades generously.
Very awesome ! Did not overcomplicate assignments and very understanding. Respects the fact that you are a college student and have other classes! Would 100 percent take his class again.
rating_tags: Amazing lectures --Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback

comment: He is so kind and does a great job of giving plenty of time for assignments. Anytime you have questions, he's quick to respond and work with you if there are any scheduling issues.

Prioritizes student success and very understanding. Classes consist of discussion posts and lectures covering concepts of writing. All hybrid work Is due the following in-person class. Extra credit opportunities. Attendance mandatory especially for 2 activities. 3 major grades including big research paper. No tests/quizzes. Very lenient grader.

If you're taking ENG1102 for the gen ed requirement, Danny is the professor to take! Class is 50% online, with class once a week. The online work is usually just a forum post or two, and most of the class and its grades revolve around writing one research paper. The professor's lectures are great, but attendance is part of the grade. Take his class
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--Caring--Graded by few things

comment: Professor Madore is a wonderful and caring person. He wants his students to succeed and he understands personal situations and is always willing to work with you to get the necessary credit. His lectures are mainly made up of really simple powerpoints, so it can be a bit boring. Easy discussion posts are due every week and only 3 big assignments.

Usually I don't take the time to rate a professor, but Mr. Madore is a fantastic professor. He is very caring and you can tell he really wants everyone to succeed within his class. There are only 2 major papers you need to write and other than that just some discussion posts every week or two. I really recommend him as a professor.

He is so sweet and cares about his students, you only have to write a few papers and he gives great feedback. Discussion posts and responding to 2 classmates almost every week but they are interesting topics and not much of a hassle (usually like 200-word min.) I would take this class again he is an awesome professor!

I'm usually not much of a person who thinks highly of one specific professor, but Madore is just amazing. He's very approachable. Despite my timidness, I had no difficulty in asking him questions after class. He's super sweet, considerate with grading, direct with instructions, and eager to assist his students. You cannot fail his class.

An outstanding instructor. Try your absolute best on the three essays that are worth a lot of points and the homework that is due every week. I didn't write the best essays, but I still got an A. He awards extra credit, so be sure to finish any missed work. He also rejects late submissions, thus the extra credit will take the place of those grades.
rating_tags: EXTRA CREDIT--Gives good feedback--Graded by few things

comment: I took him for both ENGL 1101 and 1102, take this professor!! He is amazing and gives good feedback for your papers!! We had weekly readings and once in a while he has disscussion boards. This class is not that difficult, as long as you ask questions for any concerns and submit assignments on time you will be fine.

Professor Madore was an amazing professor to have! He didn't overload us with work and genuinely seemed to care about his students. He gave good feedback on the essays without being too much of a harsh grader. Would definitely take him again!

Professor Madore is very caring and wants you to do your best in his class. He gives nice feedback on essays, and he always is willing to work with you if needed. His classes are somewhat boring, but it isn't his fault, more so the content being boring. He has a discussion post due weekly but they are very easy to do and it is an easy A.

Bets English professor EVER. I usually dont rate professors on here but for madore?? Oh I had too. Hes so sweet and breaks down the material to easily understand it. He doesnt take attendance but I suggest u go bc u might have an extra credit opportunity. Im definitely taking his 1102 class next semester. Super easy class and very understandin

Professor Madore is easily the best professor I've ever had. He takes attendance although it is not mandatory. He is willing to work with you on any assignment and he is very understanding. My class is half online half in person and everything is very accessible online.

This professor is without one of the best professors that I have had at KSU. He is very willing to help with assignments that you may struggle on. We had one quiz which was a bonus quiz and none after that, only a total of three grades, Annotated Bib, Final Research Paper and one other. If you show up to class and participate you will pass.
He is an amazing professor! He is willing to answer any questions! He gives good feedback and is very helpful when you are confused about something. I would definitely take him again!

He has nothing but my respect. I've actually had him for both ENGL 1101 and 1102. He has a way of taking a task as daunting as a research or argumentative essay and breaking it down into easy, digestible steps and tips. He genuinely cares about his students' success and understanding of the material. Also just fun to chat with. Recommend 100%.

This professor is very easy. Class gets out early most of the time and the professor does care heavily about the class and his students. Without a doubt I can say this professor has to be my favorite at KSU. I am a sophomore and he has been amazing. Would take him for every class if I could.
rating_tags: Participation matters--Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback

comment: Great professor!! 10/10 cares if you understand material or not. Easy.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Amazing lectures--Accessible outside class

comment: Attendance technically required (because of English dept. policy) but I dont think he ever took attendance. Very chill, caring, laid back guy who just started teaching. Discussion posts once a week or so, 2 essays, and a final. Besides that I showed up to class and didn't pay any attention. Easy A
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Graded by few things--Caring

comment: Prof Madore has been such a wonderful ENGL 1102 teacher. He is very easy to get a hold of, if needed. He is very understanding and kind.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Participation matters--Clear grading criteria

comment: Professor Madore is one of the best professors I've ever had. He's so nice and very lenient and understanding about late work. He explains things in detail and will reexplain things if needed. He gives good feedback on papers and is a fair grader. He really cares about helping students succeed.

Professor Madore is easily one of the best teachers/professors I've ever had. He shows he cares and gives plenty of time to complete assignments. The assignments are always explained with details and given clear guidelines and expectations. He's very understanding and gave the class a really positive atmosphere.

Class includes in class writing assignments, discussion post, 3 papers, 1 project based on previous paper. Gives much time to finish assignments. Very good at teaching material before assigning a paper. Easily accessible and always willing and wanting to help. Good at one on one teaching. Casual teacher who gets the college life. Grades easy.

He's absolutely amazing! He really took the time to teach you material and made sure you understood it by using examples and always answering questions. His assignments were always easily done. This includes in class casual writing assignments, 3 essays, and 1 multimedia project. He gives the best feedback and is always willing to help. MUST TAKE!!
Great teacher. No long classes
